languages.text: "На моем мире, шерин, есть сказки о зловещем ажи, что томится запертым в прометийной канистре. Он сулит исполнение мечты в обмен на свободу, но почему-то его чары приносят счастливчику не счастье, а гибель. Внимая мудрости Ифрита, я, пожалуй, прощу вам проигранное желание".

"On my world, shereen, we tell stories about a wicked azhi trapped in a promethium canister. He promises to grant wishes in exchange for his freedom, but for some reason his magic always leads the wisher not to happiness, but to their doom. Bearing in mind the wisdom of Efreet, I suppose I will forgive your debt of a wish."
languages.original_text: "На моем мире, шерин, есть сказки о зловещем ажи, что томится запертым в прометийной канистре. Он сулит исполнение мечты в обмен на свободу, но почему-то его чары приносят счастливчику не счастье, а гибель. Внимая мудрости Ифрита, я, пожалуй, прощу вам проигранное желание".

He promises to grant wishes in exchange for his freedom, but for some reason his magic always leads the wisher not to happiness, but to their doom. Bearing in mind the wisdom of Efreet, I suppose I will forgive your debt of a wish."

Bearing in mind the wisdom of Efreet, I suppose I will forgive your debt of a wish."

He promises to grant wishes in exchange for his freedom, but for some reason his magic always leads the wisher not to happiness, but to their doom. Bearing in mind the wisdom of Efreet, I suppose I will forgive your debt of a wish."

languages.text: “亲爱的，我的故乡有个童话故事，讲的是有个邪恶的鬼怪被困在了钷素瓶里。他答应说，只要有人愿意把他放出来，他就会实现那个人的愿望，以此换取自由。但不知为什么，他的法术总会让许愿的人遭遇不幸，最终横死。考虑到艾弗里特的古老智慧，你欠我的这个愿望就一笔勾销吧。”
languages.original_text: "On my world, shereen, we tell stories about a wicked azhi trapped in a promethium canister. He promises to grant wishes in exchange for his freedom, but for some reason his magic always leads the wisher not to happiness, but to their doom. Bearing in mind the wisdom of Efreet, I suppose I will forgive your debt of a wish."

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，我的故乡有个童话故事，讲的是有个邪恶的鬼怪被困在了钷素瓶里。他答应说，只要有人愿意把他放出来，他就会实现那个人的愿望，以此换取自由。但不知为什么，他的法术总会让许愿的人遭遇不幸，最终横死。考虑到艾弗里特的古老智慧，你欠我的这个愿望就一笔勾销吧。”

languages.text: 「あたしの世界では、プロメチウムの容器に閉じ込められた邪悪なアジーの話をするんだ。彼は自由と引き換えに願いを叶えると約束するが、なぜか彼の魔法はいつも願う者を幸福ではなく破滅へと導くんだ。イフリートの知恵を念頭に置いて、あたしはあんたの願いの借りを返すことにするよ」
languages.original_text: "On my world, shereen, we tell stories about a wicked azhi trapped in a promethium canister. He promises to grant wishes in exchange for his freedom, but for some reason his magic always leads the wisher not to happiness, but to their doom. Bearing in mind the wisdom of Efreet, I suppose I will forgive your debt of a wish."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしの世界では、プロメチウムの容器に閉じ込められた邪悪なアジーの話をするんだ。彼は自由と引き換えに願いを叶えると約束するが、なぜか彼の魔法はいつも願う者を幸福ではなく破滅へと導くんだ。イフリートの知恵を念頭に置いて、あたしはあんたの願いの借りを返すことにするよ」

languages.text: «En mi mundo, shereen, contamos historias sobre un azhi malvado atrapado en un recipiente de prometio. Promete otorgar deseos a cambio de su libertad, pero, por alguna razón, su magia nunca trae la felicidad a quien pide el deseo, sino la condena. Dada la sabiduría de Efreet, supongo que le perdono la deuda de un deseo».
languages.original_text: "On my world, shereen, we tell stories about a wicked azhi trapped in a promethium canister. He promises to grant wishes in exchange for his freedom, but for some reason his magic always leads the wisher not to happiness, but to their doom. Bearing in mind the wisdom of Efreet, I suppose I will forgive your debt of a wish."

traits.locale_text: «En mi mundo, shereen, contamos historias sobre un azhi malvado atrapado en un recipiente de prometio. Promete otorgar deseos a cambio de su libertad, pero, por alguna razón, su magia nunca trae la felicidad a quien pide el deseo, sino la condena. Dada la sabiduría de Efreet, supongo que le perdono la deuda de un deseo».

languages.text: « Chez moi, shereen, on raconte l'histoire d'un horrible azhi qui s'était retrouvé pris au piège dans un baril de prométhium. Il promettait de réaliser les souhaits de celui qui le libérerait, mais étrangement, sa magie était toujours synonyme de tragédie et non pas de bonheur. En gardant la sagesse d'Éfrit à l'esprit, je vais choisir d'effacer votre dette pour cette fois. »
languages.original_text: "On my world, shereen, we tell stories about a wicked azhi trapped in a promethium canister. He promises to grant wishes in exchange for his freedom, but for some reason his magic always leads the wisher not to happiness, but to their doom. Bearing in mind the wisdom of Efreet, I suppose I will forgive your debt of a wish."

traits.locale_text: « Chez moi, shereen, on raconte l'histoire d'un horrible azhi qui s'était retrouvé pris au piège dans un baril de prométhium. Il promettait de réaliser les souhaits de celui qui le libérerait, mais étrangement, sa magie était toujours synonyme de tragédie et non pas de bonheur. En gardant la sagesse d'Éfrit à l'esprit, je vais choisir d'effacer votre dette pour cette fois. »

languages.text: "Shereen, auf meiner Welt erzählen wir uns Geschichten über einen bösen Azhi, der in einem Kanister Promethium gefangen ist. Er verspricht jedem seine Wünsche zu erfüllen, der ihn daraus befreit, aber seine Magie verschafft seinen Befreiern kein Glück, sondern stürzt sie ins Verderben. Ich bediene mich der Weisheit von Efreet und werde Euch wohl die Schuld Eures Wunsches erlassen."
languages.original_text: "On my world, shereen, we tell stories about a wicked azhi trapped in a promethium canister. He promises to grant wishes in exchange for his freedom, but for some reason his magic always leads the wisher not to happiness, but to their doom. Bearing in mind the wisdom of Efreet, I suppose I will forgive your debt of a wish."

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, auf meiner Welt erzählen wir uns Geschichten über einen bösen Azhi, der in einem Kanister Promethium gefangen ist. Er verspricht jedem seine Wünsche zu erfüllen, der ihn daraus befreit, aber seine Magie verschafft seinen Befreiern kein Glück, sondern stürzt sie ins Verderben. Ich bediene mich der Weisheit von Efreet und werde Euch wohl die Schuld Eures Wunsches erlassen."

languages.text: "Aman diyorum şirinim, prometyum tenekesine tıkılı kalmış kötü bir azhiye dair hikâyeler anlatırız. Özgürlüğünün karşılığı olarak dilekleri yerine getirme sözü verir ama büyüleri nedense her seferinde dileyen kişiye mutluluk değil, felaket getirir. İfrit'in bana öğrettiklerini de aklımda bulundurarak dilek borcunu affetmem daha iyi olacak sanırım."
languages.original_text: "On my world, shereen, we tell stories about a wicked azhi trapped in a promethium canister. He promises to grant wishes in exchange for his freedom, but for some reason his magic always leads the wisher not to happiness, but to their doom. Bearing in mind the wisdom of Efreet, I suppose I will forgive your debt of a wish."

traits.locale_text: "Aman diyorum şirinim, prometyum tenekesine tıkılı kalmış kötü bir azhiye dair hikâyeler anlatırız. Özgürlüğünün karşılığı olarak dilekleri yerine getirme sözü verir ama büyüleri nedense her seferinde dileyen kişiye mutluluk değil felaket getirir. İfrit'in bana öğrettiklerini de aklımda bulundurarak dilek borcunu affetmem daha iyi olacak sanırım."
